settings.heading: A private yoga lesson designed around your needs and abilities is the safest & easiest way to build a healthy yoga habit!

settings.text: You will work out together with your instructors according to a program designedÂ JUST FOR YOU.

settings.title: [1] You need someone to understand your situation
settings.text:
Prenatal yoga classes focus on postures that are specifically safe and benefit pregnant women.

Our certified prenatal instructors will focus a lot on breathwork and specific yoga postures to help soon-to-be mothers connect their minds and body.

settings.title: [2] You need to take your own path to reach your goal
settings.text: Our instructor will help you to plan your practice and leads you to your goals.

settings.title: [3] Personal feedbacks will work for you
settings.text: Our instructor will give you feedbacks for your own situations.

settings.title: [4] Safety is the most priority
settings.text: Safety practice is the fastest way to improve your practice.

settings.title: [5] Proven reputation to secure your pracitice
settings.text: You need a ceitain partner with proven record. We have been working for yoga industries 18 years and have built reputation in Asia.

settings.title: [6] 1 on 1 but affordable price
settings.text:
We recruit good quality yoga
instructors from countries with relatively low currency rate so that you can make 1 on 1 practice with daily routine.

settings.title: 6 reasons why 1 on 1 practice is good for people in prenatal period?
Leng Zie
settings.text: "Prenatal Yoga is a beautiful practice to prepare for childbirth and motherhood. Like all yoga practices, it connects body, mind and during pregnancy it connects with the beautiful soul within too. From teaching breathing techniques to providing opportunities for bump-friendly stretching, prenatal yoga is great for working out for two. In addition to building strength and flexibility and relieving stress, a steady practice of prenatal yoga can help your body prepare for labour." by Leng Zie
